author: Joshua Fluke
description:
Recruiters on LinkedIn are crashing out hard. One minute they're begging candidates to respond, the next they're snapping keyboards because someone took another job. In this video, we break down the most unhinged recruiter posts: the mixed messages, the contradictory “rules,” the ghosting excuses, and the never-ending list of things candidates apparently do wrong.

Whether you answer the phone, don’t answer, follow up, don’t follow up, send your resume, or dare to have a birthday party—recruiters will find a reason to melt down. We're exposing the chaos, hypocrisy, and comedy of modern recruiting culture.

How’s your experience been with recruiters? Drop it in the comments.
